s0250: Small large mutually complete, end beginning mutually born, lead harmony clear turbid, alternate mutually as warp.
s0251: Thus music carries principles clear, ears eyes intelligent, blood qi peaceful, shift customs change habits, world all peaceful.
s0253: Gentleman joy gets way, small person joy gets desires.
s0254: With way control desires, then joy without chaos;
s0255: With desires forget way, then confused without joy.
s0256: Thus gentleman returns to feeling harmonize will, broadens joy completes teaching, music carries people turn to square, can observe virtue.
s0259: Metal stone silk bamboo, music's instruments.
s0262: Dance, moves appearance: three from heart, then music qi follows.
s0263: Thus feelings deep civilized bright, qi flourishing transforms divine, harmonious yielding accumulates center brilliant flower issues outside, only music cannot be false.
s0267: Gentleman moves root, enjoys image, then governs ornament.
s0268: Thus first drum to warn guard, three steps to show square, twice begin to manifest going, return chaos to arrange return, rouse quick without pull, extreme dark without hide.
s0269: Alone joy will, not weary way;
s0270: Complete raise way, not private desires.
s0271: Thus feelings appear righteousness established, music ends virtue honored;
s0272: Gentleman with love good, small person with cease faults: thus said 'born people way, music great'.
s0273: Gentleman says: ritual music cannot moment leave body.
s0274: Reach music to govern heart, then easy straight filial sincere heart naturally born.
s0275: Easy straight filial sincere heart born then joy, joy then peaceful, peaceful then long, long then heaven, heaven then divine.
s0276: Heaven then not speak trustworthy, divine then not angry awe.
s0279: Govern person then solemn respectful, solemn respectful then strict awe.
s0280: Heart moment not harmonious not joyful, base deceit heart enters;
s0281: Outside appearance moment not solemn not respectful, lazy easy heart enters.
s0284: Music extreme harmony, ritual extreme yielding.
s0285: Inner harmony outer yielding, then people gaze face not contend, look appearance people not born easy lazy.
s0286: Virtue splendor moves within people none not receive hear, principle issues without people none not receive follow, thus said 'know ritual music way, raise place world no difficulty'.
s0289: Thus ritual masters humility, music masters fullness.
s0290: Ritual humble advances, with advance as pattern;
s0291: Music full returns, with return as pattern.
s0292: Ritual humble not advance, then disappears;
s0293: Music full not return, then abandons.
s0294: Thus ritual has repay music has return.
s0295: Ritual gets repay then joy, music gets return then peaceful.
s0296: Ritual's repay, music's return, meaning one.
s0297: Music joy, human feelings cannot avoid.
s0298: Music must issue from sounds, form in movement stillness, human way.
s0299: Sounds movement stillness, nature method change, exhaust here.
